name: BizTalkTerminateSuspended
description: Terminates suspended service instances and optionally saves the relevant messages and metadata
author: Jason Vercellone

inputs.name: SaveMessages
inputs.label: Save
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable/disable saving messages and metadata associated with suspended instances (disabling is not recommended for Production environments).

inputs.name: Destination
inputs.label: Destination
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the directory where suspended messages and metadata will be saved.
